scripts.dev:api: cd apps/api && poetry run uvicorn src.main:app --reload --port 8000
scripts.db:migrate: cd apps/api && poetry run alembic upgrade head
scripts.db:revision: cd apps/api && poetry run alembic revision --autogenerate -m
scripts.seed: cd apps/api && poetry run python -m src.seed.load
scripts.seed:validate: cd apps/api && poetry run python -m src.seed.validate
